me thula wu saila testosteron homonaya nipadawayi.pitiyutariyen srawaya wana luteyinikarana homonaya mema saila uththejanaya karayi.testosteron homonaya shukranu jananaya karamin dwithika lingika lakshana pahala karayi.mehidi testosteron homonaya shukradhara nalikathulawu shukranu mathru saila uddipanaya karayi.melesa nipadawu shukranu walin shukradhara nalika piri yana athara eewa shukra nalika thulata wiwara wi atha.me shukra nalika wrushana wethin nikma dangara gasunu thani nalayakata ekathu we.ee api wrushanayayi.wrushana thula nipadawena shukranu thawakalikawa thanpathkota thabanne api wrushanaya thulayi.apiwrushanaye kelawarin shrakra nalika arambae.melesa arambaena shukra nala yugala pasuwa muthra margayata ekwe.

manawa himikam sambandha siddhiyedi shri lankiya sahodara janathawa wenuwen peni sitina bawada me sakachchawedi ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.manawa himikam yanna abhyanthara wishayak bawa penwadun shahidul hak mahatha thama shri lankawe wathman nayakathwaya kerehi purna wishwasaya thabana bawada jathyanthara samuluwala kumana ho mattamakadi me sambandhayen sakachcha karanu dakima thama ratata awashya nowana bawada prakasha kaleya.wasara pahakata prathama thamage shri lanka sancharaya sambandhayen sihipath kala bangladesha widesha katayuthu lekamwaraya warthamanaya wanawita shri lankawe siduwa thibena sanwardhanaya aakarshaniya menma wishmaya danawannak bawada pawasiya.dwiparshawika sahayogithawa sambandhayen angayimak kota welenda ha nawuka kshethra athulu nawa anshayanhi sahayogithawaya wardhanaya sandaha pawathina awasthawan soya balima thama shri lanka sancharaye aramuna wi thibena bawada hethema penwa dunneya.waraya ha mahamarga niyojya amathi nirmala kothalawala, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga, widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam karunathilaka amunugama, shri lankawe bangladesha thanapathi mohomad sufiyar raman, bangladesha nawika amathyansha sahakara lekam nasir arif mahmud mahathwaruda me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..

ohu shri lankeya sangitha kshethraye nim walalu pulul kala yuga purushayeki.ohu buduguna, mawuguna, deshanuragaya, premaya, wirahawa wani wishayayan osse ape rate githa kshethrayata dayada kara athi githa wishala sankhyawa athi wishalaya. 1973 juli 20 wanida kolambaa lumbini rangahaledi ‚Äòsa‚Äò prasangaya pawathwamin prathama sajiwa eekapudgala prasangayak pawathwu lankeya gayakaya lesa ithihasayata ekwiya.1966 sangitha guruwarayaku lesa siya wruththiya jiwithaya aarambha kala ohu , mathara aachchi chithrapatayen chithrapata sangitha adhyakshanayata piwisiyeya.siribo ayiya, podi malli, sarungal, hulawali saha athuru mithuru ohuge sangitha adhyakshanayen hadawunu nirmanayanya.

‚Äúkakul deke alinam api bellen alla genath thiya gannawa.kakul hathare ali thamayi poddak amaru‚Äù yayi shri lanka nidahas paksha tharuna sanwidhanaye (nil balakaye) sabhapathi hambanthota disthrik parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha me bawa prakasha kara sitiye pereda (31) anuradhapura disthrikkaye mihinthala aasanaye tharuna sanwidhana prathisanwidhana kirime awasthawata ekwemin ipalogama gonapathirawa nagaraye tharuna hamuwak amathaminya.mihinthala aasanaye mihinthalaya, eppawala, ipalogama, thirappana yana nagara kendra karaganimin kalapa mattamin raswim hatharak sanwidhanaya kara thibunu athara, ehidi shri lanka nidahas pakshayath samaga tharuna tharuniyan dahas gananak athwal badagathha.
